params.existingTestCasesJql: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.Description] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case' AND [System.State] <> 'Closed'
params.customFieldsRules: Test steps must be generated in Azure DevOps XML format with HTML-encoded content. Format: <steps id="0" last="N"><step id="1" type="ActionStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P><P>Step description</P><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step><step id="2" type="ValidationStep"><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P><P>Expected result</P><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><parameterizedString isformatted="true"><DIV><P><BR/></P></DIV></parameterizedString><description/></step></steps>. Important: All HTML tags must be encoded (< for <, > for >, & for &). Each step must have two parameterizedString elements (first with content wrapped in DIV/P tags, second empty) and a description element. Use ActionStep for test actions and ValidationStep for expected results. Each step should have a unique id starting from 1, and the 'last' attribute should equal the number of steps.
params.examples: ql(SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.Description] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.WorkItemType] = 'Test Case' AND [System.Tags] CONTAINS 'ai_example')
